title: Rational rock-salt phase engineering of a nickel-rich layered cathode interface for enhanced rate and cycling stability
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04110G, Paper
Wenjie Wang, Yanke Shi, Pengfei Li, Ruiqing Wang, Fei Ye, Xiaoyu Zhang, Wei Li, Zhuosen Wang, Chunyang Xu, Dongqing Xu, Qun Xu, Xinwei Cui
Engineering the rock-salt phase by Alâ€“N co-doping has been realized for nickel-rich layered cathodes, enhancing Li+ diffusion kinetics, electric conductivity, chemical stability, and mechanical coherence for mitigating chemo-mechanical degradation.
